mapper.select: select from tel_protection left join tel_partner on tel_protection.id = tel_partner.tel_id left join sys_user on sys_user.uid = tel_partner.partner_id where tel_protection.final_cus_id = #{finalCusId}

SELECT s.uid, s.username,sr.remark from sys_user s LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on s.uid = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sr.role_id = sur.role_id
and s.username like concat('%',#{sysUser.username},'%') and sr.role_id = 2
order by s.uid in ( SELECT partner_id from tel_partner WHERE tel_id = #{telId} ) desc

SELECT t.id,u.username as userName,t.tel,s.name as surveyName,t.apply_time,t.status,t.final_cus_id,t.survey_id as surveyId FROM tel_protection t LEFT JOIN tel_partner p ON p.tel_id = t.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.final_cus_id = u.uid LEFT JOIN zs_survey s ON t.survey_id = s.id WHERE p.partner_id = #{partnerId}
